#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char a[100];
    char ch,d;
    int i=0,c=0,f;
    while((ch=getchar())!='\n')
     a[i++]=ch;
     a[i]='\0';
     fflush(stdin);
     cin>>d;
     for(i=0;a[i]!='\0';i++)
        {
            if(a[i]==d)
                c++;
        }
cout<<c;
}
